item.title: Brad Pitt’s ‘F1’ Retakes Lead at Korea Box Office
item.description: Brad Pitt’s “F1” reclaimed the top spot at the Korean box office over the July 18–20 weekend, grossing $2.6 million from 332,902 admissions. According to KOBIS, the tracking service
